alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Delaware; Des Moines; Henry; Johnson; Jones; Lee; Linn; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Henderson, southwestern Rock Island, western Mercer, north central Hancock, northwestern Warren, Cedar, eastern Washington, south central Delaware, Muscatine, southeastern Linn, eastern Henry, Des Moines, Louisa, western Scott, Johnson, western Jones, western Clinton and northeastern Lee Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cedar Rapids to near Letts to near Colusa. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. Airport observation sites have measured wind gusts to around 40 mph or greater over the last hour. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cedar Rapids, Fairfax, Ely, Fruitland, Shueyville, Letts and Nichols around 720 PM CDT. Hiawatha around 725 PM CDT. Bertram around 730 PM CDT. Muscatine, Marion and Atalissa around 735 PM CDT. Carman and Terre Haute around 740 PM CDT. Springville, Martelle, Gulf Port and Whittier around 745 PM CDT. Wilton, Stronghurst and Viola around 750 PM CDT. Stone City and Waubeek around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Geode State Park, Muscatine County Fairgrounds, Sugar Bottom Camp Ground, Johnson County Fairgrounds, Bennett Park, Wever, Petersville, Tipton Matthews Airport, Swedesburg and Camp L-Kee-Ta. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 234 and 285. Interstate 380 between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Clinton; Delaware; Des Moines; Henry; Johnson; Jones; Lee; Linn; Louisa; Muscatine; Scott; Washington
